atk-abh01a4:1012_2: Jaccandhena vinā pīṭhasappissa disaṁ gantuṁ gamanābhisaṅkhārassa appavattanaṁ viya pañcavokāre rūpaṁ, vinā arūpassa appavatti.
atk-abh01a4:1012_3: Dvinnampi sampayogena icchitaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā sukhena jīvitakālo viya rūpārūpadhammānaṁ aññamaññayogena sabbakiccesu pavattisambhāvoti.
atk-abh01a4:1013_0: ‘Visayaggāho’ cāti, cakkhu rūpavisayaṁ gaṇhāti. Sotādīni saddādivisaye.
atk-abh01a4:1014_1: Tattha asambhinnattā cakkhussa, āpāthagatattā rūpānaṁ, ālokasannissitaṁ, manasikārahetukaṁ catūhi paccayehi uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, saddhiṁ sampayuttadhammehi.
atk-abh01a4:1014_3: Jīvato niruddhampi, pittena vā semhena vā ruhirena vā palibuddhampi, cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo bhavituṁ asakkontaṁ ‘sambhinnaṁ’ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1014_6: Cakkhusmiṁ pana asambhinnepi bahiddhā rūpārammaṇe āpāthaṁ anāgacchante cakkhuviññāṇaṁ nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:1014_7: Tasmiṁ pana āpāthaṁ āgacchantepi ālokasannissaye asati nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:1014_8: Tasmiṁ santepi kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅge anāvaṭṭite nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:1014_11: Iti ime cattāro paccaye labhitvā uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ (ma. ni.
atk-abh01a4:1015_0: Asambhinnattā sotassa, āpāthagatattā saddānaṁ, ākāsasannissitaṁ, manasikārahetukaṁ catūhi paccayehi uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ, saddhiṁ sampayuttadhammehi.
atk-abh01a4:1015_1: Tattha ‘ākāsasannissita’nti ākāsasannissayaṁ laddhāva uppajjati, na vinā tena.
atk-abh01a4:1016_0: Asambhinnattā ghānassa, āpāthagatattā gandhānaṁ, vāyosannissitaṁ, manasikārahetukaṁ catūhi paccayehi uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ , saddhiṁ sampayuttadhammehi.
atk-abh01a4:1016_1: Tattha ‘vāyosannissita’nti ghānabilaṁ vāyumhi pavisanteyeva uppajjati, tasmiṁ asati nuppajjatīti attho.
atk-abh01a4:1017_0: Asambhinnattā jivhāya, āpāthagatattā rasānaṁ, āposannissitaṁ, manasikārahetukaṁ catūhi paccayehi uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ, saddhiṁ sampayuttadhammehi.
atk-abh01a4:1017_1: Tattha ‘āposannissita’nti jivhātemanaṁ āpaṁ laddhāva uppajjati, na vinā tena.
atk-abh01a4:1017_2: Sukkhajivhānañhi sukkhakhādanīye jivhāya ṭhapitepi jivhāviññāṇaṁ nuppajjateva.
atk-abh01a4:1018_0: Asambhinnattā kāyassa, āpāthagatattā phoṭṭhabbānaṁ, pathavisannissitaṁ, manasikārahetukaṁ catūhi paccayehi uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ, saddhiṁ sampayuttadhammehi.
atk-abh01a4:1018_1: Tattha ‘pathavisannissita’nti kāyapasādapaccayaṁ pathavisannissayaṁ laddhāva uppajjati, na tena vinā.
atk-abh01a4:1018_2: Kāyadvārasmiñhi bahiddhāmahābhūtārammaṇaṁ ajjhattikaṁ kāyapasādaṁ ghaṭṭetvā pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati.
atk-abh01a4:1019_0: Asambhinnattā manassa, āpāthagatattā dhammānaṁ, vatthusannissitaṁ, manasikārahetukaṁ catūhi paccayehi uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ, saddhiṁ sampayuttadhammehi.
atk-abh01a4:1019_2: Taṁ niruddhampi, āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavituṁ asamatthaṁ mandathāmagatameva pavattamānampi, sambhinnaṁ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1019_3: Āvajjanassa pana paccayo bhavituṁ samatthaṁ asambhinnaṁ nāma.
atk-abh01a4:1019_5: ‘Vatthusannissita’nti hadayavatthusannissayaṁ laddhāva uppajjati, na tena vinā.
atk-abh01a4:1020_0: ‘Atthato’ pana cakkhu dassanatthaṁ, sotaṁ savanatthaṁ, ghānaṁ ghāyanatthaṁ, jivhā sāyanatthā, kāyo phusanattho , mano vijānanattho.
atk-abh01a4:1020_4: Ettāvatā tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravāde soḷasakamaggo niṭṭhito, saddhiṁ dvādasakamaggena ceva ahetukaṭṭhakena cāti.
atk-abh01a4:1021_2: Ayaṁ pana thero asaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikesu dosaṁ disvā ‘asaṅkhārikaṁ asaṅkhārikameva vipākaṁ deti, no sasaṅkhārikaṁ;
atk-abh01a4:1022_1: somanassasahagatatihetukaasaṅkhārikacittena hi kamme āyūhite tādiseneva vipākacittena gahitapaṭisandhikassa vuḍḍhippattassa cakkhudvāre ‘iṭṭhārammaṇe’ āpāthagate heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tayo moghavārā honti.
atk-abh01a4:1022_2: Tassa kusalato cattāri somanassasahagatāni, akusalato cattāri, kiriyato pañcāti imesaṁ terasannaṁ cittānaṁ aññatarena javitapariyosāne tadārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhahamānaṁ somanassasahagataasaṅkhārikatihetukacittampi duhetukacittampi patiṭṭhāti.
atk-abh01a4:1022_3: Evamassa cakkhudvāre cakkhuviññāṇādīni tīṇi, tadārammaṇāni dveti, pañca gaṇanūpagacittāni honti.
atk-abh01a4:1023_0: Ārammaṇena pana vedanaṁ parivattetvā kusalato catunnaṁ, akusalato catunnaṁ, kiriyato catunnanti, dvādasannaṁ upekkhāsahagatacittānaṁ aññatarena javitāvasāne upekkhāsahagatatihetukaasaṅkhārikavipākampi duhetukaasaṅkhārikavipākampi tadārammaṇaṁ hutvā uppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:1023_1: Evamassa cakkhudvāre upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṁ, imāni dve tadārammaṇānīti, tīṇi gaṇanūpagacittāni honti.
atk-abh01a4:1023_3: Sotadvārādīsupi aṭṭha aṭṭhāti ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite samacattālīsa cittāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a4:1023_4: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre aṭṭha, sotaviññāṇādīni cattārīti, dvādasa honti.
atk-abh01a4:1024_0: Somanassasahagatatihetukasasaṅkhārikakusalacittena kamme āyūhitepi upekkhāsahagatatihetukaasaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikehi kamme āyūhitepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a4:1024_2: Ettāvatā tihetukakammena tihetukapaṭisandhi hotīti vāro kathito.
atk-abh01a4:1024_3: Tihetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhi hotīti vāro pana paṭicchanno hutvā gato.
atk-abh01a4:1025_1: Somanassasahagataduhetukaasaṅkhārikacittena hi kamme āyūhite tādiseneva vipākacittena gahitapaṭisandhikassa vuḍḍhippattassa cakkhudvāre iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tayo moghavārā honti.
atk-abh01a4:1025_3: Tasmā kusalato cattāri somanassasahagatāni, akusalato cattārīti imesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ aññatarena javitapariyosāne duhetukameva somanassasahagataasaṅkhārikaṁ tadārammaṇaṁ hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1025_4: Evamassa cakkhuviññāṇādīni tīṇi, idañca tadārammaṇanti, cattāri gaṇanūpagacittāni honti.
atk-abh01a4:1025_5: ‘Iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe’ pana kusalato upekkhāsahagatānaṁ catunnaṁ, akusalato catunnanti, aṭṭhannaṁ aññatarena javitapariyosāne duhetukameva upekkhāsahagataṁ asaṅkhārikaṁ tadārammaṇaṁ hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1025_6: Evamassa upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṁ, idañca tadārammaṇanti, dve gaṇanūpagacittāni honti.
atk-abh01a4:1025_8: Sotadvārādīsupi cha chāti ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite samatiṁsa cittāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a4:1025_9: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre cha, sotaviññāṇādīni cattārīti dasa honti.
atk-abh01a4:1026_0: Somanassasahagataduhetukasasaṅkhārikakusalacittena kamme āyūhitepi upekkhāsahagataduhetukaasaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikehi kamme āyūhitepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a4:1026_1: Ettāvatā duhetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhi hotīti vāro kathito.
atk-abh01a4:1027_0: Ahetukapaṭisandhi hotīti vāro pana evaṁ veditabbo –
atk-abh01a4:1027_1: kusalato catūhi ñāṇavippayuttehi kamme āyūhite, kusalavipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyā upekkhāsahagatāya paṭisandhiyā gahitāya, kammasadisā paṭisandhīti na vattabbā.
atk-abh01a4:1027_2: Ito paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva kathetvā iṭṭhepi iṭṭhamajjhattepi cittappavatti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a4:1027_3: Imassa hi therassa vāde piṇḍajavanaṁ javati.
atk-abh01a4:1027_4: Sesā idaṁ pana javanaṁ kusalatthāya vā akusalatthāya vā ko niyāmetītiādikathā sabbā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāti.
atk-abh01a4:1027_5: Ettāvatā moravāpīvāsīmahādattattheravāde dvādasakamaggo niṭṭhito saddhiṁ dasakamaggena ceva ahetukaṭṭhakena ca.
atk-abh01a4:1028_4: Duhetukakammaṁ tihetukameva na deti, itaraṁ deti.
atk-abh01a4:1028_7: Duhetukakammena duhetukāhetukā hoti, tihetukā na hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1028_8: Asaṅkhārikakammaṁ vipākaṁ asaṅkhārikameva deti, no sasaṅkhārikaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1029_1: eko paṭhamakusalacittena kammaṁ āyūhati, paṭhamavipākacitteneva paṭisandhiṁ gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a4:1029_3: Tassa vuḍḍhippattassa cakkhudvāre ‘iṭṭhārammaṇe’ āpāthagate vuttanayeneva tayo moghavārā honti.
atk-abh01a4:1029_4: Athassa heṭṭhā vuttānaṁ terasannaṁ somanassasahagatajavanānaṁ aññatarena javitapariyosāne paṭhamavipākacittameva tadārammaṇaṁ hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1029_6: Evamassa cakkhuviññāṇādīni tīṇi, idañca tadārammaṇanti, cattāri gaṇanūpagacittāni honti.
atk-abh01a4:1029_7: ‘Iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe’ heṭṭhā vuttānaṁyeva dvādasannaṁ upekkhāsahagatajavanānaṁ aññatarena javitapariyosāne upekkhāsahagataṁ tihetukaṁ asaṅkhārikacittaṁ tadārammaṇatāya pavattati.
atk-abh01a4:1029_9: Evamassa upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṁ idañca tadārammaṇanti dve gaṇanūpagacittāni.
atk-abh01a4:1029_10: Tāni purimehi catūhi saddhiṁ cha honti.
atk-abh01a4:1029_11: Evaṁ ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite pañcasu dvāresu samatiṁsa cittāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a4:1029_12: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre cha, sotaviññāṇādīni cattārīti dasa honti.
atk-abh01a4:1030_0: Dutiyatatiyacatutthakusalacittehi kamme āyūhitepi ettakāneva vipākacittāni honti.
atk-abh01a4:1030_6: ‘Kusalato pana catunnaṁ ñāṇavippayuttānaṁ aññatarena kamme āyūhite’ti ito paṭṭhāya sabbaṁ vitthāretvā ahetukaṭṭhakaṁ kathetabbaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1030_7: Ettāvatā mahādhammarakkhitattheravāde dasakamaggo niṭṭhito hoti, saddhiṁ ahetukaṭṭhakenāti.
atk-abh01a4:1031_0: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇaṁ therānaṁ katarassa vādo gahetabboti?
atk-abh01a4:1031_4: Tenettha , asaṅkhārikakusalassa dubbalapaccayehi uppannaṁ sasaṅkhārikavipākaṁ, sasaṅkhārikakusalassa balavapaccayehi uppannaṁ asaṅkhārikavipākañca gahetvā, labbhamānānipi kiriyajavanāni pahāya, kusalajavanena tadārammaṇaṁ ārammaṇena ca vedanaṁ niyāmetvā, sekkhaputhujjanavasena soḷasakamaggo kathito.
atk-abh01a4:1031_5: Yaṁ panettha akusalajavanāvasāne ahetukavipākameva tadārammaṇaṁ dassitaṁ, taṁ itaresu na dassitameva.
atk-abh01a4:1031_6: Tasmā taṁ tattha tesu vuttaṁ sahetukavipākañca, etthāpi sabbamidaṁ labbhateva.
atk-abh01a4:1031_8: yadā hi kusalajavanānaṁ antarantarā akusalaṁ javati, tadā kusalāvasāne āciṇṇasadisameva, akusalāvasāne sahetukaṁ tadārammaṇaṁ yuttaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1032_1: Tenettha asaṅkhārikakusalassa asaṅkhārikameva vipākaṁ, sasaṅkhārikakusalassa ca sasaṅkhārikameva gahetvā, javanena tadārammaṇaniyāmaṁ akatvā, sabbesampi sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṁ uppattiraho piṇḍajavanavaseneva dvādasakamaggo kathito.
atk-abh01a4:1032_3: Duhetukajavanāvasāne duhetukaṁ, ahetukajavanāvasāne ahetukaṁ bhājetvā pana na vuttaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1033_1: ‘Tihetukakammaṁ tihetukavipākampi duhetukavipākampi ahetukavipākampi detī’ti pana vacanato asaṅkhārikatihetukapaṭisandhikassa asaṅkhārikaduhetukenapi tadārammaṇena bhavitabbaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1033_7: Ayañca sabbāpi paṭisandhijanakasseva kammassa vipākaṁ sandhāya tadārammaṇakathā.
atk-abh01a4:1033_9: 3.1.102) vacanato pana nānākammena ahetukapaṭisandhikassāpi sahetukavipākaṁ tadārammaṇaṁ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:1036_1: Idāni rūpāvacarādivipākaṁ dassetuṁ puna katame dhammā abyākatātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1036_2: Tattha yasmā kāmāvacaravipākaṁ attano kusalena sadisampi hoti, asadisampi, tasmā na taṁ kusalānugatikaṁ katvā bhājitaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1036_3: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacaravipākaṁ pana yathā hatthiassapabbatādīnaṁ chāyā hatthiādisadisāva honti, tathā attano kusalasadisameva hotīti kusalānugatikaṁ katvā bhājitaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1036_4: Kāmāvacarakammañca yadā kadāci vipākaṁ deti, rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṁ pana anantarāyena, dutiyasmiṁyeva attabhāve, vipākaṁ detītipi kusalānugatikameva katvā bhājitaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1036_7: paṭipadādibhedo ca hīnapaṇītamajjhimabhāvo ca etesu jhānāgamanato veditabbo.
atk-abh01a4:1036_8: Chandādīnaṁ pana aññataraṁ dhuraṁ katvā anuppādanīyattā niradhipatikāneva etānīti.
atk-abh01a4:1039_2: Yasmā pana tebhūmakakusalaṁ cutipaṭisandhivasena vaṭṭaṁ ācināti vaḍḍheti, tasmā tattha katattā upacitattāti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1039_3: Lokuttaraṁ pana tena ācitampi apacināti, sayampi cutipaṭisandhivasena na ācināti, tenettha ‘katattā upacitattā’ti avatvā katattā bhāvitattāti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1040_0: Suññatantiādīsu ‘maggo’ tāva ‘āgamanato saguṇato ārammaṇatoti tīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṁ labhatī’ti, idaṁ heṭṭhā kusalādhikāre vitthāritaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1040_1: Tattha suttantikapariyāyena saguṇatopi ārammaṇatopi nāmaṁ labhati.
atk-abh01a4:1040_4: Tasmā idha saguṇato vā ārammaṇato vā nāmaṁ na labhati, āgamanatova labhati.
atk-abh01a4:1041_0: Tattha maggassa āgataṭṭhāne vipassanāgamanaṁ dhuraṁ, phalassa āgataṭṭhāne maggāgamanaṁ dhuranti, idampi heṭṭhā vuttameva.
atk-abh01a4:1041_1: Tesu idaṁ phalassa āgataṭṭhānaṁ, tasmā idha maggāgamanaṁ dhuranti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1041_2: So panesa maggo āgamanato ‘suññata’nti nāmaṁ labhitvā saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca ‘animitto’‘appaṇihito’tipi vuccati.
atk-abh01a4:1041_3: Tasmā sayaṁ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano phalassa tīṇi nāmāni deti. Kathaṁ?
atk-abh01a4:1041_4: Ayañhi suddhāgamanavaseneva laddhanāmo ‘suññatamaggo’ sayaṁ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano phalassa nāmaṁ dadamāno ‘suññata’nti nāmaṁ akāsi.
atk-abh01a4:1041_5: ‘Suññataanimittamaggo’ sayaṁ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano phalassa nāmaṁ dadamāno ‘animitta’nti nāmaṁ akāsi.
atk-abh01a4:1041_6: ‘Suññataappaṇihitamaggo’ sayaṁ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano phalassa nāmaṁ dadamāno ‘appaṇihita’nti nāmaṁ akāsi.
atk-abh01a4:1041_7: Imāni pana tīṇi nāmāni maggānantare phalacittasmiṁyeva iminā nayena labbhanti, no aparabhāge vaḷañjanakaphalasamāpattiyā.
atk-abh01a4:1041_8: Aparabhāge pana aniccatādīhi tīhi vipassanāhi vipassituṁ sakkoti.
atk-abh01a4:1041_9: Athassa vuṭṭhitavuṭṭhitavipassanāvasena animittaappaṇihitasuññatasaṅkhātāni tīṇi phalāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a4:1042_2: Ayampi hi suddhāgamanavasena laddhanāmo ‘appaṇihitamaggo’ sayaṁ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano phalassa nāmaṁ dadamāno ‘appaṇihita’nti nāmaṁ akāsi.
atk-abh01a4:1042_3: ‘Appaṇihitaanimittamaggo’ sayaṁ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano phalassa nāmaṁ dadamāno ‘animitta’nti nāmaṁ akāsi.
atk-abh01a4:1042_4: ‘Appaṇihitasuññatamaggo’ sayaṁ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano phalassa nāmaṁ dadamāno ‘suññata’nti nāmaṁ akāsi.
atk-abh01a4:1042_5: Imānipi tīṇi nāmāni maggānantare phalacittasmiṁyeva iminā nayena labbhanti, na aparabhāge vaḷañjanakaphalasamāpattiyāti.
atk-abh01a4:1042_6: Evaṁ imasmiṁ vipākaniddese kusalacittehi tiguṇāni vipākacittāni veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a4:1043_0: Yathā pana tebhūmakakusalāni attano vipākaṁ adhipatiṁ labhāpetuṁ na sakkonti, na evaṁ lokuttarakusalāni. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a4:1043_2: Tena tāni attano vipākaṁ adhipatiṁ labhāpetuṁ na sakkonti.
atk-abh01a4:1043_3: Lokuttarāni pana tāya saddhāya, tasmiṁ vīriye, tāya satiyā, tasmiṁ samādhimhi, tāya paññāya avūpasantāya , apaṇṇakaṁ aviraddhaṁ maggānantarameva vipākaṁ paṭilabhanti, tena attano vipākaṁ adhipatiṁ labhāpetuṁ sakkonti.
atk-abh01a4:1044_0: Yathā hi parittakassa aggino gataṭṭhāne aggismiṁ nibbutamatteyeva uṇhākāro nibbāyitvā kiñci na hoti, mahantaṁ pana ādittaṁ aggikkhandhaṁ nibbāpetvā gomayaparibhaṇḍe katepi uṇhākāro avūpasantova hoti, evameva tebhūmakakusale añño kammakkhaṇo añño vipākakkhaṇo parittaaggiṭṭhāne uṇhabhāvanibbutakālo viya hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1044_1: Tasmā taṁ attano vipākaṁ adhipatiṁ labhāpetuṁ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a4:1044_3: tāya paññāya avūpasantāya, maggānantarameva phalaṁ uppajjati, tasmā taṁ attano vipākaṁ adhipatiṁ labhāpetīti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1045_1: Catutthaphalaniddese aññātāvindriyanti aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitañāṇakiccassa indriyaṁ, aññātāvīnaṁ vā catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitakiccānaṁ cattāri saccāni ñatvā paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitānaṁ dhammānaṁ abbhantare indaṭṭhasādhanena indriyaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1045_5: Maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannanti phalamaggassa aṅgaṁ, phalamagge ca pariyāpannanti attho.
atk-abh01a4:1046_1: ekaṁ indriyaṁ ekaṁ ṭhānaṁ gacchati, ekaṁ cha ṭhānāni gacchati, ekaṁ ekaṁ ṭhānaṁ gacchati.
atk-abh01a4:1046_3: Ekaṁ ‘aññindriyaṁ’ heṭṭhā tīṇi phalāni, upari tayo maggeti cha ṭhānāni gacchati.
atk-abh01a4:1046_5: Sabbesupi maggaphalesu atthato aṭṭha aṭṭha indriyānīti catusaṭṭhi lokuttarindriyāni kathitāni.
atk-abh01a4:1046_6: Pāḷito pana nava nava katvā dvāsattati honti.
atk-abh01a4:1046_10: Maggakkhaṇe ārati viratīti vuttā phalakkhaṇepi ārati viratīti.
atk-abh01a4:1046_11: Tattha maggo maggabhāveneva maggo, phalaṁ pana maggaṁ upādāya maggo nāma;
atk-abh01a4:1046_13: Magge bujjhanakassa aṅgoti sambojjhaṅgo, phale buddhassa aṅgoti sambojjhaṅgo.
atk-abh01a4:1049_2: pañca cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni, ekā manodhātu, ekā manoviññāṇadhātūti imāni satta cittāni –
atk-abh01a4:1049_3: pāḷito ca atthato ca heṭṭhā vuttehi tādiseheva kusalavipākacittehi sadisāni.
atk-abh01a4:1050_1: Tāni ca iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattesu ārammaṇesu vattanti, imāni aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattesu.
atk-abh01a4:1050_2: Tattha ca sukhasahagataṁ kāyaviññāṇaṁ, idha dukkhasahagataṁ .
atk-abh01a4:1050_3: Tattha ca upekkhāsahagatā manoviññāṇadhātu manussesu jaccandhādīnaṁ paṭisandhiṁ ādiṁ katvā pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccati.
atk-abh01a4:1050_4: Idha pana ekādasavidhenāpi akusalacittena kamme āyūhite kammakammanimittagatinimittesu aññataraṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā catūsu apāyesu paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccati;
atk-abh01a4:1050_5: dutiyavārato paṭṭhāya yāvatāyukaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ hutvā, aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇāya pañcaviññāṇavīthiyā santīraṇaṁ hutvā, balavārammaṇe chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇaṁ hutvā, maraṇakāle cuti hutvāti, evaṁ pañcasu eva ṭhānesu vipaccatīti.
atk-abh01a4:1054_1: Idāni kiriyābyākataṁ bhājetvā dassetuṁ puna katame dhammā abyākatātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1054_3: Sabbesuyeva hi kiriyacittesu yaṁ javanabhāvaṁ appattaṁ taṁ vātapupphaṁ viya.
atk-abh01a4:1054_4: Yaṁ javanabhāvappattaṁ taṁ chinnamūlakarukkhapupphaṁ viya aphalaṁ hoti, taṁtaṁ kiccasādhanavasena pavattattā pana karaṇamattameva hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1055_1: Dve pañcaviññāṇāni, tisso manodhātuyo, tisso manoviññāṇadhātuyo, vicikicchāsahagatanti imesu sattarasasu cittesu dubbalattā saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitiādīni na labbhanti.
atk-abh01a4:1055_2: Sesaṁ sabbaṁ vipākamanodhātuniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ, aññatra uppattiṭṭhānā.
atk-abh01a4:1055_4: Idaṁ pana pañcadvāre vaḷañjanakappavattikāle sabbesaṁ pure uppajjati. Kathaṁ?
atk-abh01a4:1055_5: Cakkhudvāre tāva iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattaaniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattesu rūpārammaṇesu yena kenaci pasāde ghaṭṭite taṁ ārammaṇaṁ gahetvā āvajjanavasena purecārikaṁ hutvā bhavaṅgaṁ āvaṭṭayamānaṁ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:1058_4: Cakkhudvāre hi padhānasāruppaṁ ṭhānaṁ disvā khīṇāsavo iminā cittena somanassito hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1058_5: Sotadvāre bhaṇḍabhājanīyaṭṭhānaṁ patvā mahāsaddaṁ katvā luddhaluddhesu gaṇhantesu ‘evarūpā nāma me loluppataṇhā pahīnā’ti iminā cittena somanassito hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1058_6: Ghānadvāre gandhehi vā pupphehi vā cetiyaṁ pūjento iminā cittena somanassito hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1058_7: Jivhādvāre rasasampannaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ laddhā bhājetvā paribhuñjanto ‘sāraṇīyadhammo vata me pūrito’ti iminā cittena somanassito hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1058_8: Kāyadvāre abhisamācārikavattaṁ karonto ‘kāyadvāre me vattaṁ pūrita’nti iminā cittena somanassito hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1059_4: 1.10.11 ādayo) kataṁ kāraṇaṁ āvajjetvā tathāgato sitaṁ pātvākāsi.
atk-abh01a4:1059_6: Tesaṁ pana dvinnaṁ ñāṇānaṁ ciṇṇapariyante idaṁ cittaṁ hāsayamānaṁ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:1059_7: Anāgate ‘tantissaro mudiṅgassaro paccekabuddho bhavissatī’ti sitaṁ pātvākāsi.
atk-abh01a4:1059_9: Tesaṁ pana dvinna ñāṇānaṁ ciṇṇapariyante idaṁ cittaṁ hāsayamānaṁ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:1060_0: Niddesavāre panassa sesaahetukacittehi balavataratāya cittekaggatā samādhibalaṁ pāpetvā ṭhapitā.
atk-abh01a4:1060_2: Uddesavāre pana ‘samādhibalaṁ hoti vīriyabalaṁ hotī’ti anāgatattā paripuṇṇena balaṭṭhenetaṁ dvayaṁ balaṁ nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1060_3: Yasmā pana ‘neva kusalaṁ nākusalaṁ’ tasmā balanti vatvāna ṭhapitaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1060_4: Yasmā ca na nippariyāyena balaṁ, tasmā saṅgahavārepi ‘dve balāni hontī’ti na vuttaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1061_0: 574.Upekkhāsahagatāti idaṁ cittaṁ tīsu bhavesu sabbesaṁ sacittakasattānaṁ sādhāraṇaṁ, na kassaci sacittakassa nuppajjati nāma.
atk-abh01a4:1061_1: Uppajjamānaṁ pana pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanaṁ hoti, manodvāre āvajjanaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1061_7: Kevalañhi tattha sappītikattā navaṅgiko saṅkhārakkhandho vibhatto.
atk-abh01a4:1062_0: Idāni yāni kusalato aṭṭha mahācittāneva khīṇāsavassa uppajjanatāya kiriyāni jātāni, tasmā tāni kusalaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a4:1063_3: Puthujjanā hi kusalato catūhi somanassasahagatehi, akusalato catūhīti, aṭṭhahi cittehi hasanti.
atk-abh01a4:1063_4: Sekkhā kusalato catūhi somanassasahagatehi, akusalato dvīhi diṭṭhigatavippayuttehi somanassasahagatehīti, chahi cittehi hasanti.
atk-abh01a4:1065_1: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakiriyaniddesesu diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti diṭṭhadhamme, imasmiṁyeva attabhāve, sukhavihāramattaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:1065_2: Tattha khīṇāsavassa puthujjanakāle nibbattitā samāpatti yāva na naṁ samāpajjati tāva kusalāva samāpannakāle kiriyā hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1065_3: Khīṇāsavakāle panassa nibbattitā samāpatti kiriyāva hoti.
atk-abh01a4:1065_4: Sesaṁ sabbaṁ taṁsadisattā kusalaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
